doctor.name: Dr. Biplob Kumar Barua
doctor.info: Dr. Biplob Kumar Barua, MBBS, MD (Nephrology). He is working as a Registrar in the Department of Nephrology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital, Chattogram. He had the opportunity to work in different District and tertiary level hospital. He had clinical Skills on Management of Kidney transplant patients and post-transplant complications. Three Individual Dialysis unit is running here under the supervision of his Department. He participated different online certified courses on management of Diabetes mellitus, Fluid and electrolyte imbalance and Haemodialysis. He is sincere, hard working and devoted to his carrier as Nephrologist. Availability on all days- 6 PM to 9 PM (Except Fridays).
